channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:14 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 17:14 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Creck on further messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
